channel.title: Comments on: 5 Steps To A Great Tennis Serve For Beginners With Pics And Video
channel.description: Your secret weapon on the court.

item.title: By: Máire
item.dc:creator: Máire
item.description:
Please can you tell me where your weight is when you toss. My weight is in the back foot and it is causing me major issues. Any easy tip would be greatly appreciated.
Many thanks
item.content:encoded:
